At Anchorage Digital, we are building the worldâs most advanced digital asset platform for institutions to participate in crypto.


Anchorage Digital is a crypto platform that enables institutions to participate in digital assets through custody, staking, trading, governance, settlement, and the industry's leading security infrastructure. Home to Anchorage Digital Bank N.A., the only federally chartered crypto bank in the U.S., Anchorage Digital also serves institutions through Anchorage Digital Singapore, Porto by Anchorage Digital, and other offerings.


The company is funded by leading institutions including Andreessen Horowitz, GIC, Goldman Sachs, KKR, and Visa, with its Series D valuation over $3 billion. Founded in 2017 in San Francisco, California, Anchorage Digital has offices in New York, New York; Porto, Portugal; Singapore; and Sioux Falls, South Dakota. Learn more at anchorage.com, on X @Anchorage, and on LinkedIn. 


This individual will think strategically about how to win our market and then lead successful go-to-market initiatives. They will be responsible for developing the strategy, building deep client and competitor understanding, and impacting the way we build, market, and sell our product and service offerings. We have created the Factors of Growth & Impact to help Villagers better measure impact and articulate coaching, feedback, and the rich and rewarding learning that happens while exploring, developing, and mastering the capabilities and contributions within and outside of the Member of Marketing, Product Marketing role:

You may be a fit for this role if you have:
  • Comfort writing short- and long-form content for an institutional audience
  • Deep knowledge of crypto
  • Experience leading marketing campaigns in a cross-functional environment
  • Are someone who constantly searches for new client and market insights to inform positioning
  • Are keen to become an expert in technical product features and influence how theyâre differentiated
  • You read about b2b product marketing tactics during your free time


Although not a requirement, bonus points if:
  • You were emotionally moved by the soundtrack to Hamilton, which chronicles the founding of a new financial system. :)

As a diverse team of more than 300 members, we are united in one common goal: building the future of finance by providing the foundation upon which value moves safely in the new global economy.
